topic.title: Replacing Drives in a Swift Node

body.p: There are two different classes of drives in a Swift node that needs to be replaced; the OS disk drive (generally /dev/sda) and storage disk drives. There are different procedures for the replacement of each classes of drives to bring the node back to normal.

section.p:
After the OS disk drive is replaced, the node must be re-imaged.
Log onto the deployer.
Using ansible, re-image the node:cd ~/helion/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost bm-reimage.yml -e nodelist=<server id>
In the example below swobj2 server is re-imaged.cd ~/helion/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost bm-reimage.yml -e nodelist=swobj2
Examine the cloudConfig.yml and data/control_plane.yml files to get the host prefix (for example, helion) and the control plane name (for example, ccp). This gives you the hostname of the node. Configure the operating system as follows.cd ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts osconfig-run.yml –limit <hostname>
In the following example, for swobj2, the hostname is helion-ccp-swobj2. cd ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts osconfig-run.yml –limit helion-ccp-swobj2*
If this is the first server running the swift-proxy service (see identifying first proxy server) you need to restore the Swift Ring Builder files to the /etc/swiftlm/builder_dir directory. See recovering builder files for details.
Configuring services on the node using the site.yml playbook. If you have used an encryption password when running the Configuration processor include the --ask-vault-pass argument.ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts hlm-deploy.yml --ask-vault-pass --limit <hostname>

After a storage drive is replaced, there is no need to re-image the server. Now, you must run the swift-reconfigure.yml playbook.
Log onto deployer
Run the following commands cd ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts swift-reconfigure.yml --limit helion-ccp-swobj002-mgmt
In following example, swobj2 the server is used.cd ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts swift-reconfigure.yml --limit helion-ccp-swobj002-mgmt
